actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain deductions of school bus drivers shall be allowable in computing adjusted gross income.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to allow the deduction of certain expenses of school bus drivers in computing their adjusted gross income.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide that certain deductions of school bus drivers shall be allowable in computing adjusted gross income.
